name: Trick no retreat
description:
Trick no retreat

I make this game for Ninja Game Jam #5.

You are a small monster, destroy the enemy that is attacking the house to protect the owner. Receiving gifts before each raid makes you stronger, but don't wear the same outfit for 2 consecutive raids.

How to play:

  • Arrow to Left/Right
  • C to Attack
  • X to Jump
  • Z to special action
  • A to interact with the house

The game made by Mực with Godot Engine

Sounds/Music I used:

Free sound effects at: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects

Demos of LMMS: https://lmms.io/
